info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Stephens, east central Habersham and west central Oconee Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 214 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Toccoa, or 4 miles southeast of Tallulah Gorge State Park. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Toccoa, Tallulah Falls, Tallulah Gorge State Park, Long Creek and Turnerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
